trans-unit.source: Provides information about the list template (that is, the <c>Microsoft.SharePoint.SPListTemplate</c>) that is represented by a node in **Server Explorer**.
trans-unit.target: 提供有关由服务器资源管理器中的节点表示的列表模板（即 <c>Microsoft.SharePoint.SPListTemplate</c>）的信息。

trans-unit.source: You can retrieve an <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.Explorer.Extensions.IListTemplateNodeInfo> object from the <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.IAnnotatedObject.Annotations%2A> property of each <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.Explorer.IExplorerNode> that represents a list template.
trans-unit.target: 你可以检索<xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.Explorer.Extensions.IListTemplateNodeInfo>对象<xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.IAnnotatedObject.Annotations%2A>每个属性<xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.Explorer.IExplorerNode>表示列表模板。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Extending the SharePoint Connections Node in Server Explorer](/visualstudio/sharepoint/extending-the-sharepoint-connections-node-in-server-explorer.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[扩展服务器资源管理器中的 SharePoint 连接节点](/visualstudio/sharepoint/extending-the-sharepoint-connections-node-in-server-explorer.md)。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.Explorer.Extensions.ListTemplateCategory" /> value that specifies the category that the list template belongs to.
trans-unit.target: 获取指定列表模板所属类别的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.Explorer.Extensions.ListTemplateCategory" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: The category that the list template belongs to.
trans-unit.target: 该列表模板所属的类别。

trans-unit.source: This value corresponds to the `Microsoft.SharePoint.SPListTemplate.CategoryType` property.
Gets a value that indicates whether the list template is hidden.
trans-unit.target: 获取指示列表模板是否隐藏的值。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the list template is hidden; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 如果列表模板处于隐藏状态;，否则为<see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the list template.
The name of the list template.
